trust.title: Dentistry you can trust.
trust.description: Our Dental Clinic has been operating for over 5 years, providing dental care for adults and children. We offer prevention, treatment and aesthetic dentistry, helping patients maintain healthy teeth as comfortably as possible.

services.title: Full range of dental services in one place

store.title: Useful products
store.subtitle: Toothpastes, brushes, care products and much more

advantages.title: Why choose
advantages.subtitle: We care about your health and comfort

about.title: About Dental Clinic
about.description: We created Dental Clinic not just as a treatment room, but as a place where people stop being afraid of dentists. For over {{years}} years we have been proving that a visit to the doctor can be comfortable, calm and even enjoyable.

item1.title: Ideal cleanliness is our obsession
item1.text: We adhere to operating room standards. All instruments undergo multi-stage cleaning and sterilization in autoclaves. Disposable materials are used strictly for one patient. Your safety is the foundation of our treatment.

item2.title: Treatment without pain and fear
item2.text: Computed tomography (3D image), laser therapy, microscope, intraoral scanners and sedation. We use the best equipment to make the process fast, accurate and absolutely painless.

item3.title: The best doctors work here
item3.text: There are no random people in our team. These are doctors who constantly learn new things, share experiences and truly love their profession.

doctors.title: Doctors you can trust with your smile

waiting.title: Bright waiting area
waiting.desc: Soft sofas, fresh press, water and coffee. It's pleasant to be here.

cabinet.title: Modern office
cabinet.desc: Comfortable chair, sterile environment, monitor showing your image.

reception.title: Reception
reception.desc: Administrators are always friendly and will help with any question.

operating.title: Operating room
operating.desc: Perfect order and the latest equipment for implantation.

documents.title: We are open
documents.description: We don't want to be a 'black box'. We are confident in our professionalism and quality of equipment. On our website you can always view documents confirming our right to treat.

reviews.title: Reviews about {{name}}
reviews.loginPrompt: Please log in to leave a review
reviews.noReviews: No reviews yet. Be the first!

cta.title: Want to make sure we're right for each other?
cta.text: Come meet us! Initial consultation with examination and treatment plan is conducted in a calm, friendly atmosphere without rushing.

youknow.title: INTERESTING FACTS
youknow.subtitle: About the amazing biology of teeth

1.title: CHEWING SYMMETRY
1.subtitle: Dominant side
1.description: 87% of people chew food on the same side they write with. Left-handers use the left side of the jaw, right-handers use the right. This is an example of neuromuscular coordination.

2.title: BIOLOGICAL ARCHIVE
2.subtitle: Memory of teeth
2.description: Teeth store information about childhood nutrition and climate, like tree rings. This is a natural time capsule of your body.

3.title: SMILE
3.subtitle: Neurobiology of happiness
3.description: The brain produces endorphins in response to a smile ‚Äî even an artificial one. Simple facial expressions trigger the biochemistry of joy.

4.title: PEARL SHADE
4.subtitle: Health aesthetics
4.description: The natural shade of healthy teeth is not snow-white, but with a slight creamy undertone. This indicates dense, high-quality enamel.

5.title: REGENERATION
5.subtitle: Ability to recover
5.description: A knocked-out tooth can re-implant if returned to the socket within 30 minutes. Amazing vitality of the natural system.

6.title: SALIVA
6.subtitle: Liquid crystal
6.description: Saliva contains a complete mineral complex for micro-restoration of enamel. This is an autonomous 24/7 protection system.

7.title: CHEESE
7.subtitle: Gastronomic protection
7.description: Hard cheese after eating creates a protective film on the enamel. A natural product with ideal calcium bioavailability.

8.title: PRICELESSNESS
8.subtitle: Uniqueness of the original
8.description: A healthy tooth cannot be artificially reproduced with 100% biological accuracy. This is an ideal engineering system.

9.title: Ancient technologies
9.subtitle: Evolution
9.description: The first dental 'drills' appeared 9,000 years ago (found in Pakistan), and the Maya decorated teeth with precious stones, inserting them directly into the enamel.

10.title: Effects of smoking
10.subtitle: Hidden threats
10.description: Nicotine tars create a sticky film that turns into stone within 48 hours, and constriction of gum vessels 'masks' bleeding, hiding the development of periodontitis until tooth loss.

footer.aboutUs: Modern dentistry with care for your health and comfort. Over 15 years of experience and thousands of satisfied patients.
